column5: Hey this is "walleye central" not "pike central" so let's talk size and 'eyes Can anyone top a 34" walleye? I caught and released it in June 2003 on Lake O'Sullivan in Quebec. Caught it drifting a pink and white 1/4 oz. jig (seems everything hits that) in 12-15 feet o' water. I need to post a picture of that one. It was 10 pounds 10 ounces and did NOT have a Pike in its mouth. I'll post the photo. Happy New year Andy
Yup I can top that walleye! Jut tep on the brake! Roger Mayer.
Caught a 12lb9oz last july. filled the bugger up and ate the cheek meat too.
Got me a nice 15 incher. Got it mounted and put it on the wall next to my trophy yearling doe.
